description:
Hi,
I'm a french almost 34 years old considering moving to New-Zealand with my almost 9 years old son (I've been thinking about it for a while now). The covid-19 pandemic not making it easy to even plan a visit there, I thought I would try and make some online Kiwi friends first.
I'm homeschooling my son so I don't have much time to myself. When I do, and I'm not sleeping, I usually read, write, watch tv series, play guitar/ukulele or go for a walk on the hills (we live near the Pyrenees moutains) with my son/dog/cat... whoever follows.
It's my first time writing a serious online profile and it's quite a boring exercise... or maybe I'm just not very good at it.
